summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1632, for the improvement of Sixth Avenue South, from the intersection of Weller Street to Seattle Boulevard; Seattle Boulevard, from Sixth Avenue South on the north to Sixth Avenue South on the south; and Sixth Avenue South, from Seattle Boulevard to Connecticut Street, by the construction of a pipe bridge, under Ordinance No. 17341 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
